name: Maxmind.eu Hotel Reservations
author: vanMeerdervoort.nl

sections.description:
This plugin adds a widget that allows you to easily include the maxmind.eu hotel reservation system into your WordPress hotel site. You can add as many plugins as needed. It works well together with Widget Logic plugin and WPML to create different translations. The plugin automatically includes the proper jQuery scripts from the maxmind servers and is easy to configure.

  • You need a maxmind.eu account for this to work.

Usage

  1. Enter your maxmind.eu hotel ID and the other requested data in the Maxmind Settings page which you will find under the Settings tab on your dashboard.
  2. Add the widget to one of your sidebars, click Save. Then you can enter a widget title and language. If you install the Widget Logic plugin you can
    also specify the language for which the specific widget should be shown.

1.1.2

  • Tested up to WP version 4.8

1.1.1

  • Small bug fix

1.1.0

  • Tested up to WP 4.7.3
  • Small bug fix

1.0.9

  • Tested up to WP 4.2.4
  • Compatibility fixes

1.0.8

  • Tested up to WP 4.0.1

1.0.6

  • minor bug fix

1.0.5

  • minor bug fix
  • addition of short explanation on the settings page

1.0.4

  • Namechange on request of Maxmind.com

1.0.3

  • compatibility with WP 3.6
  • Bug fix with jQuery clash in admin

1.0.2

  • Bugfixes

1.0.1

  • Support for multiple instances of the widget

1.0.0

  • Initial launch
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your blog
  2. Activate it
  3. Enter your maxmind.eu info in the settings page
  4. Add the widget to your sidebar
  5. Create a page for your bookings and add the shortcode {maxengine} to that page (nothing else)

NOTE:

Make sure you enter something in the Meta Description field of the page you’re using for your {maxengine} otherwise it will not work properly!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin to your blog
  2. Activate it
  3. Enter your maxmind.eu info in the settings page
  4. Add the widget to your sidebar
  5. Create a page for your bookings and add the shortcode {maxengine} to that page (nothing else)

NOTE:

Make sure you enter something in the Meta Description field of the page you’re using for your {maxengine} otherwise it will not work properly!

Who are you?

I’m a musician – check my band Harmony Glen and designer. While I was installing a WordPress website for a hotel I ran into this Maxmind.eu reservation system and decided to make life easier for myself by creating this plugin.

I am in no way related to the company Maxmind.eu.

So you provide support?

Yes. But please note: I have nothing whatsoever to do with the company Maxmind.eu. I can only provide support for this plugin, not for maxmind.eu account related stuff! If you need an account or have questions about maxmind.eu please contact them directly at www.maxmind.eu

For plugin related support: I will try and answer as soon as I can. But keep in mind I’ve put this plugin up here just because I think it could be useful to others too. I am really busy so it might take some time for me to reply!
